title.narrative: Vietnam Public Financial Management (PFM) Analytical and Advisory Assistance (AAA) Program

description.narrative:
The objectives of the Program are to: (i) support strengthening the capacity of executive bodies to make, implement, and monitor policies to improve budget planning and execution in a transparent, accountable, and sustainable manner; and (ii) provide empirical analysis of the effectiveness and efficiency of major public finance reforms at both the central and local levels of government.
The Program will provide support both at national (Ministry of Finance) and sub-national (Danang City) levels, with the possibility of extending to work with other subnational governments (e.g. Ho Chi Minh City) and the National Assembly in the future.
